features: 【Two Pocket Folder Set】Paper folders with 2 inner pocket and 2 business card slots. Deep pocket design can provide secure storage space for papers, files or other important materials.
【Large Capacity】Two pocket folders is made of durable and texture paper, not easy to break and deform. Holds 50+ sheets per pocket, ideal for long-term use and storage.
【Perfect Size】Folder with pockets fits standard 8.5" ×11" letter size paper. You can decorate them, adding labels or writing on them to personalize your folders and make them easily identifiable.
【Assorted Colors】100 pack colored File Folders in off green, blue, yellow, orange and magenta, code your notes or documents in these specific colors to keep them organized by subject or project.

【Multifunctional】Paper File Folders are great for organizing and keeping your work environment tidy. Ideal for school or office use, for organize and protect classroom assignments or office material, also work well for home projects, receipts, tax paperwork and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my class
reviews.reviewText: These are great for homework folders! I let the kids pick their colors, and they loved them. The colors are very vibrant. I'll update with pictures soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the variety of colors from this set. They are perfect for classrooms and the office. The quality is thick and does not rip easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly useful product, colors are great for organizing paperwork
reviews.reviewText: These two-pocket folders come in 5 vibrant colors. They are nicely textured, have “pockets” inside on both sides, and each pocket has 4 small slits in it to accommodate a business, or other similarly sized, card. The pockets are actually more of a trough since the folded flap forming them is not glued at the inside spine so thus the “pocket” goes all the way across. These RAZCC folders feel lighter than ones I am used to, so in an attempt to be as objective as possible, I made some quantitative measurements of the folders under review and of some new-old-stock folders of the same style that are at least a decade older. The RAZCC folders are 8% lighter by weight and the material is 8% thinner in thickness.The vendor suggests that each folder “Holds 50+ sheets per pocket, ideal for long-term use and storage”. I tried placing 50 sheets of 20 lb. copy paper in each pocket. While it was possible, the result was not desirable (see photo). The pockets were over-extended and the folder would not lay flat. If you do intend on using these for long-term use, I recommend that you not put 50+ sheets per pocket.Irrespective of these issues, I am pleased with these folders for my intended purposes. I intend them for daily uses such as: filing like papers together; holding airline, rental car, and accommodation information while on travel (they fit nicely in the carry-on bag’s front pocket), corralling related project papers into one place, organizing bills, etc. I can, and do, recommend them, and, provided they are not overfilled, I expect them to have an acceptably long service life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Folders for your needs
reviews.reviewText: Thick paper folders with 2 pockets for your event, conference or organizing filing cabinet. I use them for manuals that come with appliances, electronics tools, etc. I just have to go to the file and pull the books for parts, prices, troubleshooting. I give some to the grandkids for school too. Looking at the price it’s very efficient to buy this many and use for the kids in school. The colors are vibrant and the folders are durable. 2 thumbs up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pack of folders!
reviews.reviewText: Please note that the box comes completely full. My photo shows some empty space in the box because my family did not hesitate at all to start grabbing folders and using them! LOL! These are typical 2 pocket folders. They have a textured feel on the outside. And inside has slits in each pocket, in case you want to put something like a business card there. These would be great for home, office, or school. Good quality. Vivid colors. Nice textures feeling on outside. Hold up very well. Very happy with this folders!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good basic folders
reviews.reviewText: These are great for the price. You get a lot of folders. These are your basic paper two-pocket folders. They feel nice. They feel heavier than some paper folders you can get a box stores during back-to-school sales. I got these for my classroom for students that don't have folders, and have had no issues or complaints with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great! Slightly Dull Colors, but you can't beat the toughness of these folders
reviews.reviewText: This are the folders you see everywhere. Businesses use them for promotional materials and it's like they know you're going to throw it around in your car for 3 weeks before you remember to carry it in the house and bury it under a pile of junk mail for the next 5 months. Then, you'll need to know something about whatever you were buying that they were selling and you'll run around looking for it. Eventually you'll find it and all the material looks just like new because these are some tough folders. Colorful enough to get your attention and for you to remember. You can hear it now, "Honey, where's the green folder that car salesman gave us with information about the new Teslas?" Ha! You know what I mean. These are great for their intended purpose with the business card cutouts to hold those cards in place for months or years. You cannot beat the price and you get so much more than what you pay for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vibrant and Functional Folders
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this set of 100 folders for use in my music classroom as sheet music folders. They come in 5 vibrant colors (orange, magenta, yellow, green, and blue) and each color has 20 folders. They are simple, no-frills folders that work well for my purposes. They arrived quickly and the kids really like the bright colors.
